prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Core concepts of Promptbook include collections of pipelines, tasks, personas, parameters, pipeline execution, expectations, and postprocessing. Advanced concepts cover knowledge integration, remote server usage, metaprompting, and multi-lingual support.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, collections, pipelines, tasks, personas, parameters, pipeline execution, expectations, postprocessing, knowledge integration, remote server, metaprompting, multi-lingual support
